        stakes mapping it will return zero amount. If the message is
        already progressed or revoked then the penalty amount will be
        zero.

     * @return penalty_ Penalty amount.

hashRedeemIntent

confirmBountyAmountChange().return: changedBountyAmount_  updated bounty amount.previousBountyAmount_ previous bounty amount.

params._beneficiary: Address where the unstaked value tokens will be                    transferred.
params._blockHeight: Block number for which the proof is valid.
params._gasLimit: Gas limit that redeemer is ready to pay.
params._gasPrice: Gas price that redeemer is ready to pay to get the                 redeem and unstake process done.
params._rlpParentNodes: RLP encoded parent node data to prove                       Declared in messageBox outbox of                       CoGateway.

params._blockHeight: Block number for which the proof is valid.
params._rlpParentNodes: RLP encoded parent node data to prove                       DeclaredRevocation in messageBox outbox of                       CoGateway.

confirmRevertRedeemIntent(bytes32,uint25.return: redeemer_ Redeemer address.redeemerNonce_ Redeemer nonce.amount_ Redeem amount.

params._baseToken: The ERC20 token address that will be used for                    staking bounty from the facilitators.
params._bounty: The amount that facilitator will stakes to initiate the               stake process.
params._burner: Address where base tokens will be burned.
params._maxStorageRootItems: Defines how many storage roots should be                            stored in circular buffer.
params._valueToken: The ERC20 token contract address that will be              staked and corresponding utility tokens will be minted              in auxiliary chain.

params._messageHash: Message hash to get the status.

params._account: Account address for which the nonce is to be fetched.

params._messageHash: Message hash to get the status.

progressRevertStake(bytes32,uint256,byte.details: Message bus ensures correct execution sequence of methods and also     provides safety mechanism for any possible re-entrancy attack.

params._blockHeight: Block number for which the proof is valid
params._rlpParentNodes: RLP encoded parent node data to prove                       DeclaredRevocation in messageBox inbox of                       CoGateway.

progressRevertStake(bytes32,uint256,byte.return: staker_ Staker address.stakerNonce_ Staker nonce.amount_ Stake amount.

progressStake(bytes32,bytes32).details: Message bus ensures correct execution sequence of methods and also     provides safety mechanism for any possible re-entrancy attack.

params._unlockSecret: Unlock secret for the hashLock provide by the                     staker while initiating the stake.

progressStakeWithProof(bytes32,bytes,uin.details: This can be called to prove that the inbox status of messageBox on     CoGateway is either declared or progressed.

params._blockHeight: Block number for which the proof is valid.
params._messageStatus: Message status i.e. Declared or Progressed that                      will be proved.
params._rlpParentNodes: RLP encoded parent node data to prove in                       messageBox outbox of CoGateway.

progressUnstake(bytes32,bytes32).details: Message bus ensures correct execution sequence of methods and also     provides safety mechanism for any possible re-entrancy attack.

params._unlockSecret: Unlock secret for the hashLock provide by the                     facilitator while initiating the redeem.

progressUnstake(bytes32,bytes32).return: redeemer_ Redeemer address.redeemAmount_ Total amount for which the redeem was                      initiated. The reward amount is deducted from the                      total redeem amount and is given to the                      facilitator.unstakeAmount_ Actual unstake amount, after deducting the reward                       from the total redeem amount.rewardAmount_ Reward amount that is transferred to facilitator.

progressUnstakeWithProof(bytes32,bytes,u.details: This can be called to prove that the outbox status of messageBox on     CoGateway is either declared or progressed.

params._blockHeight: Block number for which the proof is valid.
params._messageStatus: Message status i.e. Declared or Progressed that                      will be proved.
params._rlpParentNodes: RLP encoded parent node data to prove in                       messageBox inbox of CoGateway.

progressUnstakeWithProof(bytes32,bytes,u.return: redeemAmount_ Total amount for which the redeem was                      initiated. The reward amount is deducted from the                      total redeem amount and is given to the                      facilitator.unstakeAmount_ Actual unstake amount, after deducting the reward                       from the total redeem amount.rewardAmount_ Reward amount that is transferred to facilitator.

params._blockHeight: Block height at which Gateway/CoGateway is to be                     proven.
params._rlpParentNodes: RLP encoded value of account proof parent nodes.

revertStake(bytes32).return: staker_ Staker addressstakerNonce_ Staker nonceamount_ Stake amount

params._amount: Stake amount that will be transferred from the staker               account.
params._beneficiary: The address in the auxiliary chain where the utility                    tokens will be minted.
params._gasLimit: Gas limit that staker is ready to pay.
params._gasPrice: Gas price that staker is ready to pay to get the stake                 and mint process done.
params._hashLock: Hash Lock provided by the facilitator.

stake(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,ui.return: messageHash_ Message hash is unique for each request.

token().details: This function supports previous versions of this contract's ABI     that expect a public function, token, that returns the address     of the value token.

activateGateway(address).notice: Activate Gateway contract. Can be set only by the        Organization address only once by passing co-gateway address.

confirmBountyAmountChange().notice: Method allows organization to confirm proposed bounty amount        after unlock period.

confirmRevertRedeemIntent(bytes32,uint25.notice: Declare redeem revert intent.        This will set message status to revoked. This method will also        clear unstakes mapping storage.

methods.constructor: Initialize the contract by providing the ERC20 token address        for which the gateway will enable facilitation of stake and        mint.

deactivateGateway().notice: Deactivate Gateway contract. Can be set only by the        organization address

getInboxActiveProcess(address).notice: Method to get the active message hash and its status from inbox        for the given account address. If message hash does not exist        for the given account address then it will return zero hash and        undeclared status.

getInboxMessageStatus(bytes32).notice: Method to get the inbox message status for the given message        hash. If message hash does not exist then it will return        undeclared status.

getNonce(address).notice: Get the nonce for the given account address.

getOutboxActiveProcess(address).notice: Method to get the active message hash and its status from outbox        for the given account address. If message hash does not exist        for the given account address then it will return zero hash and        undeclared status.

getOutboxMessageStatus(bytes32).notice: Method to get the outbox message status for the given message        hash. If message hash does not exist then it will return        undeclared status.

initiateBountyAmountChange(uint256).notice: Method allows organization to propose new bounty amount.

penalty(bytes32).notice: Gets the penalty amount. If the message hash does not exist in        stakes mapping it will return zero amount. If the message is        already progressed or revoked then the penalty amount will be        zero.

progressRevertStake(bytes32,uint256,byte.notice: Complete revert stake by providing the merkle proof.        This method will return stake amount to staker and burn        facilitator bounty.

progressStakeWithProof(bytes32,bytes,uin.notice: Completes the stake process by providing the merkle proof        instead of unlockSecret. In case the facilitator process is not        able to complete the stake and mint process then this is an        alternative approach to complete the process

progressUnstakeWithProof(bytes32,bytes,u.notice: Completes the redeem process by providing the merkle proof        instead of unlockSecret. In case the facilitator process is not        able to complete the redeem and unstake process then this is an        alternative approach to complete the process

proveGateway(uint256,bytes,bytes).notice: This can be called by anyone to verify merkle proof of         gateway/co-gateway contract address. Trust factor is brought by         state roots of the contract which implements StateRootInterface.         It's important to note that in replay calls of proveGateway         bytes _rlpParentNodes variable is not validated. In this case         input storage root derived from merkle proof account nodes is         verified with stored storage root of given blockHeight.         GatewayProven event has parameter wasAlreadyProved to         differentiate between first call and replay calls.

revertStake(bytes32).notice: Revert stake process and get the stake        amount back. Only staker can revert stake by providing        penalty i.e. 1.5 times of bounty amount. On progress revert stake        penalty and facilitator bounty will be burned.

stake(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Initiates the stake process.  In order to stake the staker        needs to approve Gateway contract for stake amount.        Staked amount is transferred from staker address to        Gateway contract. Bounty amount is also transferred from staker.

userdoc.notice: EIP20Gateway act as medium to send messages from origin chain to        auxiliary chain. Currently gateway supports stake and revert stake message.
